title: Snap To Surface Feature
description:
`minecraft:snap_to_surface_feature` snaps the y-value of a feature placement pos to the floor or the ceiling within the provided `vertical_search_range`. The placement biome is preserved. 
If the snap position goes outside of the placement biome, placement will fail.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The name of this feature in the form `namespace_name:feature_name`. `feature_name` must match the filename.

feature_to_snap.title: Feature to snap
feature_to_snap.description: Named reference of feature to be snapped

vertical_search_range.title: Vertical search range
vertical_search_range.description: Range to search for a floor or ceiling for snaping the feature.

surface.title: Surface
surface.description: Defines the surface that the y-value of the placement position will be snapped to. Valid values: `ceiling` and `floor'
